name: Beat the Boss 1
description:
Its a small Boss Game where you have to pick up the Rock and throw it at the boss!
Dodge his Fire and his Falling Stones!
Look out! He tries to stomp on you!

If u are low on health I got a backup for u ;) Hearts are spawning wich you can pick up and heal urself with!

This is only the first Mini Bossgame!
Stay tuned!
